General.Name: Ningxia Orient Tantalum Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningxia Orient Tantalum Industry Co., Ltd. research, develops, produces, and sells rare metals in China. The company offers tantalum, niobium, beryllium, and related alloys. Its products are primarily used in electronics, metallurgy, chemical industry, medicals, atomic energy, aerospace, and other fields. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shizuishan, China.

1.Name: Mr. Hongwu  Qin
1.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
